column4: They usually grow in mossy tree shades only, will diminish here soon.
Alene! There you are. Haven't I warned you to not go into the forest alone? You know of the dangers lurking there!
No need for explanation! You did something bad and we both know this. Now come in and get your lesson.
I assume you, good master witcher, have brought my daughter home. We're thankful for that.
Wait for me in the tavern, I've got something to talk to you about.
Witcher! Leave! This is not your matter
I- I will leave her alone
Shouldn't mingle in a family's personal affairs..
